original_title: The Shaman & Ayahuasca: Journeys to Sacred Realms
overview: Filmed in the jungles of Peru, shaman Don Jose Campos introduces the practices and benefits of Ayahuasca, the psychoactive plant brew that has been used for healing and visionary journeys by Amazonian shamans for at least a thousand years.
title: The Shaman & Ayahuasca: Journeys to Sacred Realms
